workshoptitle: Simplify distributed transactions with Oracle MicroTx to prevent inconsistent data and financial losses

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisite for customers using the Sandbox. The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.description: Verify the setup of the Compute instance.
